explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning models for early warning signals, including six typical machine learning models.
explanations.classification: The early warning signals can be captured by machine learning models, which typically involve classification tasks to identify regime switching.
explanations.regression: Machine learning models used for early warning signals may also involve regression tasks to predict continuous outcomes related to regime switching.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions the random forest model, which is an ensemble method based on decision trees, as having better performance in capturing early warning signals.
